title: Service Area Pages for Local SEO, Explained (2024)

tactics.name: Schema Markup for LocalBusiness
tactics.description: Structuring location data with schema markup helps search engines understand and prioritize location-specific content for rankings.
steps: Create JSON-LD schema for LocalBusiness type
Include geo coordinates and service-specific details
source_quotes: this page and the pages like it are specifically optimized through a whole wide range of techniques we use to rank in search engines

tactics.name: Google Business Profile Optimization
tactics.description: Prioritize Google Business Profile to enhance local visibility and provide essential contact info like hours and phone number
steps: Create and verify Google Business Profile
Add service areas and contact details
caveats: Avoid displaying physical address for service-based businesses
source_quotes: your company will be displayed and this is actually a service area business profile

heuristics.name: Schema Markup Boost
heuristics.condition: If a page has schema markup, it should be prioritized for ranking
source_quotes: this page and the pages like it are specifically optimized through a whole wide range of techniques we use to rank in search engines

heuristics.name: Schema Markup Presence
heuristics.condition: If a page has schema markup then boost ranking
source_quotes: your company will be displayed and this is actually a service area business profile

claims.statement: Service area pages require 3+ months of optimization to show organic rankings
source_quotes: these landing pages here we're looking at are only about 3 months old so only half of them have actually started to rank on Google

claims.statement: Google Business profiles outrank organic landing pages in local search
source_quotes: this is 20 centuries profile here this will be your number one marketing tool to Market your services locally

claims.statement: Prioritizing Google Business Profile improves local search visibility
source_quotes: prioritize your Google business profile first

niche_patterns.description: Targeting specific services in defined geographic areas aligns with user intent for localized solutions
niche_patterns.why_it_works: High intent queries with lower competition for niche location-based keywords
source_quotes: if we scroll down a little further we don't we don't come up right away right I don't see 20th century roofings landing page yet

niche_patterns.description: Use visual indicators to show service areas instead of physical addresses
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Signals service-based business intent and geographic coverage
source_quotes: they actually um show up in a range of areas rather than just one city
